context.title: Filtered JDT
context.description: This sphere is a special variant of the Java static that only filters all queries to only include methods that were actually executed in one or more program traces. It requires one or more Java dynamic runtime spheres to also be configured.

context.title: Java dynamic runtime sphere
context.description: This sphere describes the relations encoded in a dynamic runtime program trace.

context.title: Importing TPTP Runtime Traces
context.description: This wizard is used to select a set of dynamic runtime program traces.
